name: MultiplayerInfo
desc_en:
**Features:**
- Choose what info you want to see on the multiplayer results table from rank, max combo, total misses, bombs/walls hit, score, percent, and accuracy!
- Give people in your lobby nicknames :) (only visible to you)
- Check the global rank of players in your lobby (if they have a ScoreSaber or BeatLeader account associated with their id)!  

**Compatible with BeatTogether, MultiplayerCore, and ServerBrowser. Does not change anything in BS+'s Multiplayer+**  
**SongPlayHistory's Multiplayer Results Percentage might override or conflict with Results Info if both are enabled!**
